about_the_game:
About This Content


Step back in time and discover a long-lost railway, from old-time stations to heavy limestone operations. Re-tread the rails through historical English countryside in the hard-working Fowler 4F. The quaint and waning years of 1960s steam is brought back to life in Train Sim World 3: Peak Forest Railway!

The romantic steam era returns to Train Sim World with the introduction of the iconic Fowler 4F. Built in Derby and dating back to the early 1920s, this prolific fleet of locomotives were designed for mid-ranged freight work by Henry Fowler, Chief Mechanical Engineer of the LMS railway. With 575 produced, but only a handful surviving into preservation, rekindle the flames of this workhorse 0-6-0 tender legend.

Tackle challenging loads; hefty ICI Limestone Hoppers, local and long-distance passenger trains all await haulage through the endlessly picturesque Peak District. Go to battle with banking locomotives and double-heading to conquer the steep gradients which blast through the English countryside of yesteryear. Rails cling to hillsides and fly over valleys on this now lost and once vital main line.

From the intricately detailed stations of the British Railways era to the largest Limestone quarry in Europe, every mile and chain is recreated in nostalgic detail. Embark on all-new steam journeys with Train Sim World 3: Peak Forest Railway!

Key Features


  • 38-mile route recreating the lost East Midlands line between Ambergate, Chinley & Buxton in Derbyshire, England, as it was in the early 1960s
  • Historically accurate details, trackwork and infrastructure
  • 14 authentic stations, 4 disused stations and multiple freight yards
  • LMS Fowler 4F steam locomotive in BR Late Unlined Black livery
  • LMS Jubilee Class Steam Locomotive in BR Late Brunswick Green livery
  • LMS Stanier 8F Class Steam Locomotive in weathered BR Late Unlined Black livery
  • Mk1 FK, TSO, BSO and BG Coaches in BR Maroon and Blood & Custard liveries
  • ICI Hopper, 16t Mineral, 5-plank, Conflat and Standard Van Wagons, and a 20t Brake Van
  • Authentic steam locomotive operation including Banking and Double-Heading
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • 6 engaging Scenarios and a comprehensive 24-hour Timetable
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • A selection of Route Tasks to complete
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download Size: 6.8 GB
